schemaMeta.comments: Extension to the LADM used by SOLA to implement Case Management functionality.

table.name: Function: get_concatenated_name
table.comments: Returns a concatenated list of all cadastre objects associated to the BA Unit referenced by the application.

table.name: Function: get_work_summary
table.comments: Returns a summary of the services processed for a specified reporting period. Used by the Lodgement Statistics Report.

table.name: Sequence: application_nr_seq
table.comments: Sequence number used as the basis for the Application nr field. This sequence is used by the generate-application-nr business rule.
